title: Conscience with the power and cases thereof Devided into V. bookes. Written by the godly and learned, William Ames, Doctor, and Professor of Divinity, in the famous University of Franeker in Friesland. Translated out of Latine into English, for more publique benefit.
author: Ames, William, 1576-1633.
publicationStmtPublisher: Imprinted [W. Christiaens, E. Griffin, J. Dawson],
